div.head: Welcome to WPRO IRIS
div.p: The WHO Regional Office for the Western Pacific's Institutional Repository for Information Sharing (WPRO IRIS) is the digital library of WPRO's published material and technical information in full text produced since 1951.
Its content is freely accessible and searchable in English. Content in Chinese and French are currently digitized and are available on request at wprorepository@wpro.who.int.
